body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Son of Robert C. Mayes and Agnes T. Locke Mayes. Married to Eliza B. Crump Mayes in Trigg County, Kentucky, on December 25, 1832. Married to Elizabeth Ann Utterback Mayes in Calloway County, Kentucky, on January 3, 1842. Father of Emma C. Mayes, Robert Mayes, and Julia Mayes. Attorney in Cadiz in 1850. Owned twenty-five enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1850. Attorney in Cadiz in 1860. Owned twenty-four enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1860. Partner with John R. Grace in the law firm of Mayes and Grace from 1860 to 1865.
